ops_per_clock_notes.bf16: 2 TensorCores x 4 MXUs/TC x 128x128 systolic x 2 (MAC) = 262,144 BF16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: Same throughput as BF16 (275 TFLOPS = 275 TOPS for INT8 per Google docs)
ops_per_clock_notes.note: TPU v4 has 8 MXUs total (4 per TensorCore). 2x performance over v3.

theoretical_peaks_notes: 275 TFLOPS BF16 and 275 TOPS INT8 confirmed by Google Cloud docs. 2x improvement over v3.
notes: Google TPU v4 (2021). 2 TensorCores with 4 MXUs each (8 MXUs total, 128x128). 7nm process. 32GB HBM2 at 1.2 TB/s. 3D torus topology. 90-192W power range. 2x faster than v3.
